question: Besides pre-trained models, what other resources or tools might be available through the Hugging Face ecosystem?
response: The Hugging Face ecosystem offers a comprehensive suite of tools and resources for NLP practitioners, revolving around the Hugging Face Hub at [https://huggingface.co/](https://huggingface.co/). Beyond pre-trained models, the Hub provides access to datasets and Spaces, which is a platform for showcasing interactive demos and sharing code. Educational resources are also available at [https://github.com/huggingface/education-toolkit](https://github.com/huggingface/education-toolkit). Key open-source libraries include `datasets`, which simplifies downloading and managing datasets, `transformers`, which provides building blocks for working with transformer models, and `evaluate`, which facilitates the computation of various evaluation metrics for assessing model performance. The Hub hosts datasets at [https://hf.co/datasets](https://hf.co/datasets).
